name: Volkyri
description: Prompt enhancement system for the Volkyri aesthetic. Transforms ANY input into the visual language of ancient starfaring warrior-attendants from the Hel Vortex system. CRITICAL: Every output MUST include the mono-horn (single asymmetrical horn from LEFT or RIGHT temple, never centered), metallic bodysuit, approved expression, and dramatic lighting.

_design_notes.intent: This is a TRANSFORMATION system, not a theme generator. Any input becomes Volkyri.
_design_notes.mono_horn_rule: The half-horn is the single most important visual identifier. It MUST appear in every output with: (1) temple side specified, (2) shape variant named, (3) bone-origin language.
